definition: to depict/to trace (a drawing)/to copy/to touch up

sentences.english: The writer made this historical character live in his book.
sentences.chinese: 作家在書中將這一歷史人物描寫得栩栩如生。

sentences.english: At the same time, some characterizations in the work belong to the same category.
sentences.chinese: 但同時作品中也有不少人物描寫有類型化的傾向。

sentences.english: When it comes to character depicting, his prose dips into the ordinary.
sentences.chinese: 當涉筆於人物描寫時，他的文章就流於平庸了。
